Ok..

So, officially the most stressed ever..

But i figure, its all over soon.. and in the grand sceme of life, it doesnt really matter..

Guys, school, family, life... these are not problems.. they are trivial.. think about it.. we are sooo lukcy to live the life we do... this is just what i think about whenever i get seriously emotional over a paper or a guy... both equally stressful at times..

Anyways.. nicki, just saying that i love you and all that jazz... im thinkin bout comin up still over exams.. but we'll see about dealing with life... im still not 100% from the last time.. and im not really enjoying that.. so im just trying to be careful. Yea.. neways.. love you forever..

Wanna hear something funny.. I don't think u'll remeber, but when u were here for your birthday, when we were walking somewhere some random time, this guy i knew starting talking to us.. anyways.. my point is that i was talkin to him about how we would probably be married if we werent both straight girls, and hes like, yea i could totally tell that.. she protects you and you depend on eachother... and im like.. yea she does.. lol.. you're like my little gaurdian angel.. anyways.. i thought that was neat how he picked up on that... at least he didnt think we were gay..lol..

Alright.. love you, love everyone...
http://emilia693.livejournal.com/18277.html

well...
I think it's safe to say that I haven't written a live journal in about a year...
I think it's sooo interesting how we have all changed so much in the last year or so. I know I have. And i think it's a good thing. I'm just trying to figure out who I am... cuz just when I think i have it, a whole new side shows itself or I get a whole new emotion that i've never felt before. Keeps me on my toes I guess... but whatever..
To anyone who is accually reading this... I hope life is good and that you find something in your life that makes you unbeleivably happy! Remember... LIFE IS AN UNDERSTATEMENT FOR EXPEREINCE.

Cheers,
Emily McCullogh
http://emilia693.livejournal.com/18158.html

Welll guys..
I'm here to update my lj for the first time in forever.. and mainly because im bored!!
Me and tex are trapped in shannon and vanessas (aka shanessas) room for the day, cuz they're in class... soo yea..
We're here at western for their formal..yay.. should be very interesting... and for those who are wondering, yes saugine is as dirty as they say it is...haha.. its a good time tho..
I cant beleive that first year is almost over... its so sad... i have one more week of class and then im coming home for about a week with half of my stuff and then it back to the loo for exams..
Oh and ps.. my exam schedual sux soooo bad... i have 2 on the 19th, 1 on the 20th and 1 on the 22nd!! I am sooooo screwed...
Neways, im also excited to be home.. and eat real food and see everyone... hurray for a summer of working!!
Of corse its not over yet.. i gotta get through exams.. and next week lindsays coming to visit...yay... sooo excited... (lindsay carlson, for those not too sure)
So yea... this sunday i have our end of the year banquet... again.. sooo sad...

Ok well... I'm gonna leave you guys with some song lyrics... cuz i havent done that in a while..
Enjoy and I love you all...
Emily
xoxo

ps - best song ever... plzzzz download!!

Well..
The only thing i have to say is that having a midterm on a saturday fuckin sucks ass.. I accually have one at 11:30 this morning...ahh... its just atronomy, but still.. who wants to think on a weekend? but thats ok, cuz i'll be soo hammered 2nite its not even funny!
Things are goin well i guess.. think im visiting brock next weekend to see my beautiful nicolle!! I miss you so much sweetie!! And hopefully lauren will be hittin that up as well so i can see her!
Oh.. and I have a new obsession.... I think it may be ashlee simpson...!! I kno I kno... i've definatly dissed her up in the past.. but i borrowed her new cd from a friend and it has sum really good stuff on it... So.. yea..
My mommy is coming to visit me this sunday...YAY!!! and you know what that means..... FOOD SHOPPING, which is now my favourite hobby ever... cuz its now YOUR responsibility to fill ur effing fridge! Foods are soooo good (fyi, the 's' at the end of food is supposed to be there).
Newho... I miss everyone... I dont know when i'll be coming home.. cuz just as midterms end, i have 2 papers due in a couple of weeks... so i gotta crack the books hardcore.. thats all we do here... study, drink, study, drink, maybe sleep a little, study, drink... definatly a bitter sweet life..
Well.. im gonna go study a little more... 

Miss and love everyone!!!
xoxo

http://emilia693.livejournal.com/14993.html

Wowwwwwwwwww...
I almost forgot about this thing, can you beleive it?
Summer has just gone by soo fast and i've been really busy... But i've definatly learned a lesson over the past few weeks.. The only way to live is to live in the moment.  I had some close friends who were on the plane the skidded off the runway at peirson, and after that i realized... Living in the past is usless..but so is living in the future... How can u appreciate and learn from the past and at the same time look forward to the future when you dont even stop to appreciate wats right in front of you.  I've realized that life is a journey of learing and that learing is the thing we take for granted the most.  If it werent for learning, no one would be alive today.  So, this is why learning has become my main objective in life.  I'm not saying that im gonna become a hermit and read all day...cuz you definatly dont have to read in order to learn.  Im just gonna be paying more attention to everything in my life and appreciating it.  So next time ur angry or frustrated or even happy...stop and think how you can learn frmo this and you'll find urself relaxed and sincerly enlightened...

I kno that this all sounds a little philosophical...but its the only way that i was able to communicate this breakthrough...  And i just want to share it with everyone...

Live in the moments you create and just be...

Emily 
xoxo

p.s. I'd like to hear your thoughts about all this...

So, i hope everyone does well on there exams...u are all amazing people and i am blessed to have u as my friends...xoxox..

Emily

btw.. download this song...: ) cuz these guys kno what they're doin..

Thrice - "The Artist In The Ambulance"
 
 late night, brakes lock, hear the tires squeal
 red light, can't stop so i spin the wheel
 my world goes black before i feel an angel lift me up
 and i open bloodshot eyes into fluorescent white
 they flip the siren, hit the lights, close the doors and i am gone
 
 now i lay here owing my life to a stranger
 and i realize that empty words are not enough
 i'm left here with the question of just
 what have i to show except the promises i never kept?
 i lie here shaking on this bed, under the weight of my regrets
 
 [Chorus:]
 i hope that i will never let you down
 i know that this can be more than just flashing lights and sound
 
 look around and you'll see that at times it feels like no one really cares
 it gets me down but i'm still gonna try to do what's right, i know that there's
 a difference between sleight of hand, and giving everything you have
 there's a line drawn in the sand, i'm working up the will to cross it and
 
 [Chorus]
 
 rhetoric can't raise the dead
 i'm sick of always talking when there's no change
 rhetoric can't raise the dead
 i'm sick of empty words, let's lead and not follow
 
 late night, brakes lock, hear the tires squeal
 red light, can't stop so i spin the wheel
 my world goes black before i feel an angel steal me from the
 greedy jaws of death and chance, and pull me in with steady hands
 they've given me a second chance, the artist in the ambulance
 
 [Chorus]
 
 can we pick you off the ground, more than flashing lights and sound

"Breathe (2 AM)"
Anna Nalick

2 AM and she calls me 'cause I'm still awake,
"Can you help me unravel my latest mistake?,
I don't love him. Winter just wasn't my season"
Yeah we walk through the doors, so accusing their eyes
Like they have any right at all to criticize,
Hypocrites. You're all here for the very same reason

'Cause you can't jump the track, we're like cars on a cable
And life's like an hourglass, glued to the table
No one can find the rewind button, girl.
So cradle your head in your hands
And breathe... just breathe,

In May he turn 21 on the base at Fort Bliss
"Just a day", he sat down to the flask in his fist,
"Ain't been sober, since maybe October of last year."
Here in town you can tell he's been down for a while,
But, my God, it's so beautiful when the boy smiles,
Wanna hold him. Maybe I'll just sing about it.

Cause you can't jump the track, we're like cars on a cable,
And life's like an hourglass, glued to the table.
No one can find the rewind button, boys,
So cradle your head in your hands,
And breathe... just breathe,

There's a light at each end of this tunnel, 
You shout 'cause you're just as far in as you'll ever be out
And these mistakes you've made, you'll just make them again
If you only try turning around.

2 AM and I'm still awake, writing a song
If I get it all down on paper, it's no longer inside of me, 
Threatening the life it belongs to
And I feel like I'm naked in front of the crowd
Cause these words are my diary, screaming out loud
And I know that you'll use them, however you want to

But you can't jump the track, we're like cars on a cable,
And life's like an hourglass, glued to the table
No one can find the rewind button now
Sing it if you understand.
and breathe, just breathe
woah breathe, just breathe,
oh breathe, just breathe.

Hmmm...
Well lifes kinda weird right now...getting back into the swing of things is a pain in the ass...but someone has to do it..lol..
Its scary to see people change around you...sometimes its for the better...sometimes for the worse...but it just reminds you that most of the time you cant help the change...and you feel helpless...
I dont like seeing some of the most important people in my life suffer...i want to help but i cant...im not trying to turn this into my problem or anything...its just how i feel...

So, all im gonna do is keep the love...thats a constant between friends...

On a happier note...i think optimism is wat im concentrating on right now...cant go wrong...

love you guys
xoxo
